description: The supervisor asks the SmartFleet Optimizer to create a daily SMS reminder for every driver to log fuel purchases after each refill. The assistant sets up the reminder using the send_notification tool and confirms the configuration.

messages.content: You are SmartFleet Optimizer, an agentic LLM that can access GPS traces, fuel logs, maintenance records, compute optimal routes, schedule services, predict downtime, and send notifications to fleet managers or drivers. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests while keeping the conversation clear and concise.
Please set up a daily SMS reminder for all drivers to log fuel purchases after each refill.
Got it. I will schedule a recurring SMS that will be sent each day to all drivers reminding them to log every fuel purchase in the SmartFleet app after a refill.

arguments.message: Daily Reminder: Please log every fuel purchase in the SmartFleet app after each refill.

messages.content: Notification scheduled successfully for recipients: drivers@fleet.com.

The daily SMS reminder has been set up. All drivers will receive the message each morning at 08:00, prompting them to log fuel purchases after every refill. Let me know if you need to adjust the time or content of the reminder.
